problem.markdown: 1.Which configuration of latches will result in a rising edge register? (x) negative latch followed by a positive latch ( ) negative latch followed by a negative latch ( ) positive latch followed by a positive latch ( ) positive latch followed by a negative latch
problem.p: 1.Which configuration of latches will result in a rising edge register?

choicegroup.choice: negative latch followed by a positive latch
negative latch followed by a negative latch
positive latch followed by a positive latch
positive latch followed by a negative latch
